sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>"Hand scanner" is a catchall designation for a wide variety of handheld scanning devices designed to run specific-purpose scans. Some of the most common versions of these are medisensors, such as the RFX/K Medisensor made by BioTech Industries. The device can be used independently or plugged into a medpac or datapad, and displays a variety of useful bio-signs about the subject. Other scanners can check for atmospheric contaminants, poisons, vermin, or in the case of mechanics, micro-fractures or stress points.  Models Include: RFX/K Medisensor.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Hand Scanner</name> <number>GEAR0001055</number> <price>100</price> <range/> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:10:05</sys_created_on> <sys_id>315f13a02f14a450e0f497eef699b66c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:10:05</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
